features: REPAIR & REVIVE YOUR STRANDS: This 13-fluid ounce bottle of OGX Extra Strength Damage Repair + Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner helps repair and revive strands, turning thick, coarse hair into silky perfection

TAME FRIZZ & FLYAWAYS: Ideal for dry or frizzy hair, the hydrating Conditioner helps calm frizz and tame flyaways as if helps soften and repair tresses. It also leaves hair feeling smooth and full of bounce and shine

HAIR CARE INSPIRED BY NATURE: The nourishing damage remedy blend contains coconut oil to help add luster, shine & softness to hair along with vanilla bean extract and essence of tiare - an infused perfume-oil made from soaking the petals in coconut oil

IRRESISTIBLY DELICIOUS SCENT: The creamy coconut, white peach and shea butter scent leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell every time you condition; Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle on your tresses
UP TO 82% LESS BREAKAGE after one use *vs. non-conditioning shampoo; For optimal results, use the Coconut Miracle Oil Extra Strength collection of shampoo, conditioner & oil
body.description: Repair & revive your senses and strands with OGX Extra Strength Damage Repair + Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner. This damaged hair conditioner helps transform thick, coarse hair into silky perfection. Ideal for dry or frizzy hair, the hydrating conditioner also helps calm frizz and tame flyaways as it helps soften and repair tresses. The nourishing damage remedy blend is infused with coconut oil and the formula helps to add luster, shine & softness to hair along with vanilla bean extract and essence of tiare - an infused perfume-oil made from soaking the petals in coconut oil. Plus, the coconut milk, tangerine and warm vanilla scent makes conditioning your hair an all-around sensory experience that leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, this restorative coconut conditioner represents beauty, pure and simple. For a full repairing frizzy hair care routine, pair this flyaway-taming conditioner with OGX Coconut Miracle Oil Shampoo.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: we approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner 13oz Envelop your senses in an island escape with this ultra-rich repairing blend with coconut oil. This ultra-nourishing and rejuvenating blend calms frizz and tames flyaways, leaving hair with a silky soft bounce and shine. Intensely moisturizing conditioner The perfect remedy for dry, damaged strands Leaves hair feeling nourished and silky smooth With Coconut Oil, Essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract Sulfate free surfactant hair care system

Benefits, Ingredients, Hair Type, Regimen Benefits Help revive even the most damaged strands and send your senses on an island escape with Coconut Oil, Vanilla Bean Oil and Essence of Tiarre. Ingredients Drench dry, damaged strands with the secret of Maui. This ultra-rich repairing blend with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract helps to repair, soften and revive strands. Discover silky, soft, island-girl hair. Hair Type This product is good for everyday use, works well with most hair types. *Fine *Damaged *Curly *Frizzy *Course/Textured *Color-Treated Regimen For best results, use our entire Coconut Miracle Oil collection to help with every day moisture. After shampooing, we recommend our conditioner followed up with one of the treatments to help moisturize and restore shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Hair's Ultimate Revitalization
reviews.reviewText: The OGX Extra Strength Damage Remedy + Coconut Miracle Oil Shampoo is a true savior for my hair. Tailored for dry, frizzy, or coarse hair, this hydrating and flyaway-taming shampoo has reinvigorated and renewed my locks. It's an essential step in my hair care routine, and I'm pleased to provide a five-star review for this remarkable shampoo.Intensive Hydration:This shampoo excels in providing intensive hydration, quenching the thirst of dry and coarse hair, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and rejuvenated.Hair Repair:The damage remedy feature of this shampoo is nothing short of remarkable. It's effectively repaired and revitalized the health of my hair, making it more resilient to everyday stress.Coconut Miracle:The infusion of coconut miracle oil has worked wonders on my frizzy hair. It effectively tames flyaways, all while infusing a delightful fragrance that lingers and leaves my hair smelling fantastic.Chemical-Free Formula:The paraben-free and sulfate-free formulation is a welcome touch. It guarantees that the shampoo is free from harmful chemicals, making it a safe choice for regular use.Nourishing Blend:This shampoo boasts a nourishing formula that rejuvenates a wide range of hair types, from dry to coarse, adding a luxurious touch to my hair care routine.Effective Frizz Control:The shampoo's ability to effectively tame frizz and flyaways is a game-changer. It makes my hair easier to manage and style, giving it a more polished and put-together look.In conclusion, the OGX Extra Strength Damage Remedy + Coconut Miracle Oil Shampoo is a five-star solution for revitalizing and rejuvenating your hair. It excels in providing intensive hydration, repairing damage, and taming frizz, thanks to the infusion of coconut miracle oil. Whether you have dry, frizzy, or coarse hair, this shampoo is a must-have to add an extra touch of luxury and care to your hair care routine. It doesn't just improve your hair's health; it makes it a breeze to manage and style. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking a top-tier hair care solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had bought the shampoo, conditioner and mask. Don't waste money on the mask. Because this conditioner works much better than the mask. Soft, silky, and the smell is absolutely amazing. I will buy again, and the price is right. Much better than others I have bought in the same price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner. It took my brittle dry hair that had been bleached and dyed about 15 times and helped get it healthy again! Has a great smell and it really lasts. really doesnt need to be used with another product but using hair oil and leave in conditioner will take this to a whole nother level

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's okay , made my hair soft and it smelled nice. But never saw any difference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really moisturizes hair and is a gray detangler. Leaves hair feeling soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell and the results! Works wonders on my thin, damaged hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't keep hair nice for long
reviews.reviewText: Bought the conditioner and shampoo of this. I like the smell and it definitely does what it's supposed to but it feels like I have to rewash and condition my hair every couple days as opposed to once or twice a week with any others I've used. I don't know if it's because of the coconut oil or what but I don't feel like I will be buying this again. It's also half the size of a typical bottle but costs more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this conditioner. It makes my hair feel soft and less tangled without weighing it down. It’s thick but rinses out nicely. The smell is lovely. It’s got a very tropical and coconut scent that is nice!
Me encanta su aroma, deja el cabello muy suave

I have extremely frizzy hair, which means there are flyers from every nook and corner. This conditioners settles those flyers, gives unbelievably soft hair and provides volume.The best part is, your hair is so well tamed, you can actually identity the pattern of your hair ( something that's not visible in naturally black and brown hairs).I am going to keep purchasing this one.

Seller or packer, packed defective item, it doesnt even have a cover. Therefore, during the shipping process, it exploded & spilled all over the big. If the cover is attached, i would understand... This item doesnt even have the cover. Its pure dishonesty.
